function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of widespread testing and screening technologies","Impact":"Inability to identify and contain COVID-19 outbreaks","Mitigation":"Increase investment in testing and screening technologies, and integrate them into policy and practice","Technologies":"Digital thermometers, smartwatch applications, and systematic screening technologies","People":"General population","Owner":"Government and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Ineffectiveness of digital systems for screening vital signs and self-reporting of symptoms","Impact":"Failure to detect asymptomatic individuals and those with long incubation periods","Mitigation":"Develop more accurate and cost-effective digital screening technologies, improve training for personnel, and implement complementary methods such as contact tracing","Technologies":"Advanced vital sign screening technologies","People":"Healthcare workers, researchers, and technology developers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Privacy and surveillance concerns with aggressive contact tracing","Impact":"Violation of privacy and potential public resistance","Mitigation":"Ensure transparency in data collection, minimize data retention, and establish clear guidelines for data use and access","Technologies":"Security camera footage, facial recognition technology, bank card records, GPS data","People":"General population","Owner":"Government and regulatory authorities"}]}
